table.sql: create table cs_snippet( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, sni_id bigint(20) not null, sni_name varchar(250), sni_content text, app_id varchar(250), site_id varchar(250) default '' )
create table cs_template( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, t_id bigint(20) not null, t_ver int(4), app_id varchar(255), site_id varchar(255) )

create table cs_template_class( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, tclass_id bigint(20) not null, tclass_ename varchar(255), tclass_cname varchar(255), tclass_memo varchar(1000), app_id varchar(255) )

create table cs_template_category( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, tcat_id bigint(20) not null, tclass_id bigint(20), tcat_ename varchar(255), tcat_cname varchar(255), parent_id bigint(20), tcat_position varchar(255), tcat_memo varchar(1000), app_id varchar(255), site_id varchar(255), sort_id int(4) default 999 )

create table cs_template_edit( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, t_id bigint(20) not null, tcat_id bigint(20), t_ename varchar(255), t_cname varchar(255), t_path varchar(255), t_content longtext, t_ver int(4), creat_user bigint(20), creat_dtime varchar(20), modify_user bigint(20), modify_dtime varchar(20), app_id varchar(255), site_id varchar(255), t_status varchar(4) default 0 )

create table cs_template_ver( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, t_id bigint(20) not null, tcat_id bigint(20), t_ename varchar(255), t_cname varchar(255), t_path varchar(255), t_content longtext, t_ver int(4), creat_user bigint(20), creat_dtime varchar(20), modify_user bigint(20), modify_dtime varchar(20), app_id varchar(255), site_id varchar(255), t_status varchar(4) )

create table cs_design_css( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, css_id bigint(20) not null, css_ename varchar(255), css_name varchar(255), thumb_url varchar(255), weight int(4) default 0, app_id varchar(255), site_id varchar(255) )

create table cs_design_layout( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, layout_id bigint(20) not null, layout_name varchar(255), layout_content longtext, thumb_url varchar(255), weight int(4) default 0, app_id varchar(255), site_id varchar(255) )

create table cs_design_module( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, module_id bigint(20) not null, datasouce_type int(4) default 0, module_name varchar(255), module_content longtext, v_code longtext, thumb_url varchar(255), style_ids varchar(500), attr_ids varchar(500), weight int(4) default 0, app_id varchar(255), site_id varchar(255) )

create table cs_design_style( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, style_id bigint(20) not null, style_name varchar(255), class_name varchar(255), thumb_url varchar(255), weight int(4) default 0, app_id varchar(255), site_id varchar(255) )

create table cs_design_frame( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, frame_id bigint(20) not null, frame_name varchar(255), frame_content longtext, thumb_url varchar(255), weight int(4) default 0, app_id varchar(255), site_id varchar(255) )

create table cs_design_case( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, case_id bigint(20) not null, css_id bigint(20) not null, case_name varchar(255), case_content longtext, thumb_url varchar(255), weight int(4) default 0, app_id varchar(255), site_id varchar(255) )

create table cs_design_category( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, cat_id bigint(20) not null, css_id bigint(20) not null, template_id bigint(20) not null, design_content longtext, page_type varchar(50), publish_status int(4) default 0, app_id varchar(255), site_id varchar(255) )
